mapper.select: SELECT sum( CASE WHEN conversion_efficiency > 85 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) conversionEfficiencyStatus, sum( CASE WHEN inverter_loss > 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) inverterLossStatus, sum( CASE WHEN temp > 43 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) tempStatus, sum( direct_status ) directStatus, sum( three_phase_current_imbalance_status ) threeStatus, sum( overall_status ) overallStatus , COUNT(overall_status) sumStatus FROM jb_power_inverter_data
SELECT avg(conversion_efficiency) yData,data_time xData from jb_power_inverter_data where inverter='NBQ002' GROUP BY data_time
SELECT sum(power_value) xData,inverter yData from jb_power_inverter_data GROUP BY inverter
SELECT sum(fault_cnt) xData,device_id yData from jb_status_info GROUP BY device_id
SELECT STATUS, count( components_string ) AS componentsString FROM jb_power_components_string GROUP BY STATUS
SELECT power_unit yData,count(status) xData from jb_power_components_string GROUP BY power_unit
